div.ab:
شهد موسى بن الفضل بن على إقرار جعفر بن محمّد ابن محسن بما فيه وكتب بخطّه
شهد محمّد بن الحسن بن محسن على إقرار جعفر الأصغر بن محمّد بما في هذا
الكتاب وكتب بخطّه
شهد

šahida mūsà bnu ăl faḍli bni ******* ʿalà ʾiqrāri ǧaʿfara bni muḥammadi ĭbni muḥsin:in bi mā fī hi wa kataba bi ḫaṭṭi hi
šahida muḥammadu bnu ăl ḥasani bni muḥsin:in ʿalà ʾiqrāri ǧaʿfara ăl ʾaṣġari bni muḥammad:in bi mā fī hāḏā
ăl kitābi wa kataba bi ḫaṭṭi hi
šahida **** **** **** ****

Mûsâ b. al-Faḍl b. .......... is witness to the acknowledgment by Ǧaʿfar b. Muḥammad b. Muḥsin respecting that which (is contained) herein, and he has written (it) in his (own) handwriting.
Muḥammad b. al-Ḥasan b. Muḥsin is witness to the acknowledgment by Ǧaʿfar, the younger, b. Muḥammad respecting the tenor of this
contract, and he has written (it) in his (own) handwriting.
Witness is ...................................................
